title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.18 - Lost articles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.18 - Lost articles

State Regulations

All persons finding lost articles at the terminal shall
deliver them to the baggage and express room. Articles unclaimed by the owner
or owners within three months after the finding thereof will be turned over to
the finders, except when found by Port Authority employees on
duty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
